name: G-Max Gravitas
effect: The Psychic-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Mindstorm while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Additionally, Gravity gets applies to both battlefields.
description: The user channels a psychic beam and attacks with it, shifting the gravity within the battlefield to be more extreme.
